oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Levitation studies on 1-2-3 cuprate superconductors
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHATTACHARYYA, A
AIYAR, RPRC
PRAKASH, O
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A magnet is observed to levitate with lateral stability over a YBa2Cu3O7-delta (1-2-3) superconductor (SC) at 77K. Here, we report the results of levitation experiments using 1-2-3 SC discs. A hysteresis curve of levitation force with levitation distance is obtained that reveals SC character of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: ASIAN JOURNAL OF PHYSICS, VOL 6 NOS 1 AND 2, JANUARY-MARCH 1997: PROCEEDINGS OF THE DAE-BRNS SYMPOSIUM ON ELECTROCERAMICS,196-200
